name: Tree Rush
description:
Tree Rush

This little bot has the important mission of collecting as many trees as possible. Unfortunately, the place he was sent to is really dangerous. The reason for that is the presence of lots of weird shurikens that might stop him from completing his mission.

  • What kind of place is that?
  • Who sent him?
  • And why?

Help the little bot in his mission and find out what awaits him at the end of his path.
